sql.where:
1=1
AND ${minTotalPrice}<=max_total_price AND ${maxTotalPrice}>=min_total_price
AND layout_range @> '{${layOut}}'
AND district_id IN (${districtId})
AND school_type_array @> '{${school}}'
AND has_medical = ${hospital}

mapper.select:
select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY star_property DESC nulls LAST LIMIT 200

select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY has_subway ASC,ring_road DESC,has_lift ASC LIMIT 100

select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY has_subway ASC,ring_road DESC,has_lift ASC,has_market ASC LIMIT 100

select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY has_subway ASC,ring_road DESC,has_lift ASC,has_market ASC LIMIT 100

select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY has_subway ASC,ring_road DESC,has_lift ASC,has_market ASC,propertyfee ASC,park_radio DESC LIMIT 100

select
from intelligence_findhouse
ORDER BY has_subway ASC,ring_road DESC,has_lift ASC,has_market ASC,propertyfee ASC,park_radio DESC LIMIT 100

select count(*) from intelligence_findhouse WHERE 1=1
and min_total_price<= #{plotTotalEnd} and max_total_price >= #{plotTotalFirst}
